full_summary:
-----
**Government Tender Announcement:**
-----

**Title:** Phase 1 Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) - Highway Maintenance - Wood Buffalo National Park

**Competition ID:** WS3712619418

**Publication Date:** October 20, 2022

**Closing Date and Time:** November 7, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST

**Contract Start Date:** March 1, 2023

**Contract End Date:** July 31, 2030

**Extension Option:** Contractor may grant Canada an option to extend the contract for an additional four-year term.

**Notice:**
-----

This is the first phase of a two-phase procurement process, where interested suppliers will be evaluated on their qualifications. The second phase will consist of a Request for Proposal (RFP) to which qualified suppliers will be invited.

**Scope of Work:**
-----

The Government of Canada invites interested suppliers to submit their qualifications for the provision of highway maintenance services for Wood Buffalo National Park, which straddles the boundaries of the Government of Alberta and the Government of the Northwest Territories. The scope of work includes operations and maintenance activities, such as winter and non-winter cyclical activities and elective activities necessary to maintain highways and assets in a manner that meets the desired service levels.

**Key Project Details:**
-----

*   Project Location: Wood Buffalo National Park
*   Total Length of Chip-Sealed Highway: 117 km
*   Total Length of Gravel Highway: 261.6 km
*   Contract Duration: September 1, 2024 to July 31, 2030

**Eligibility and Contact Information:**
-----

In order to be eligible, suppliers must meet the selection criteria, which includes a combined rating of technical merit and price. For further information, please contact Parks Canada Agency at [alison.guilford@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alison.guilford@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). 
-----

Note: Please disregard the original Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 7, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.  Only 36 days were left for the tender to be submitted after this announcement.
